full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,BKA' DRIN DANG RJES 'DZIN GSOL 'DEBS DON GNYIS LHUN GRUB ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @001A *, ,(CES PA 'DI NI BKA' DRIN DANG RJES 'DZIN GSOL 'DEBS DON GNYIS @001B LHUN GRUB CES BYA BA 'DI YANG, A'I RIGS KYI BTZUN PA GSANG 'DZIN RDO RJES, ,RANG DANG RIGS BRAS SKU RIM PA RNAMS KYI RGYUN 'DON GYI CHED DU BRIS PA'I YI GE PA NI DAD BRTZON RNAM DPYOD DANG LDAN PA'I DBU MDZAD DGE TSUL BLO BZANG BRTZON 'GRUS SO, ,)
